form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service Miami, Florida, (05-12-78)

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service Miami, Florida AUTHORIZED CIVIL SURGEONS IMPORTANT: As soon as you receive this notice you are required to make arrange- ments for your medical examination with one of the following medical examiners who will perform the required laboratory and X-Ray procedures as well as 'the medical examination. The total cost of this examination will not exceed $30.00 which amount is required to be paid by you. The results of the medical examina- tion must be presented at your scheduled Immigration interview. NEITHER AN X-RAY NOR A BLOOD TEST IS NECESSARY FOR A CHILD UNDER 15 YEARS OF AGE: HOWEVER, THE CHILD MUST BE MEDICALLY EXAMINED BY A DESIGNATED CIVIL SURGEON. MEDICOS AUTORIZADOS IMPORTANTE: Al recibo de este aviso es imprescindible que usted pida un turno con un médico de la lista a continuación. El médico llevará a cabo las investigaciones de laboratorio y Rayos X tanto como el examen médico correspondiente. E1 costo total no excederá de $30.00 cuya cantidad debe ser abonada por usted. Los resulta- dos del examen medico deben ser presentados el dia de su entrevista en ,Inmigración. NINOS MENORES DE 15 ANOS NO NECESITAN EXAMEN DE LA SANGRE NI RADIOGRAFIA DEL TORAX PERO SI DEBEN SOMETERSE A UN RECONOCIMIENTO MEDICO POR UN MEDICO DE LA LISTA. DADE COUNTY Armando F.
